title: Srirama Chandra Bhanja Dental College and Hospital
text: Srirama Chandra Bhanja Dental College and Hospital is a government dental college located in <a href="Cuttack">Cuttack</a>, in the <a href="India">India</a>n state of <a href="Odisha">Odisha</a>. It is the oldest and only government dental college in <a href="Odisha">Odisha</a>. It is affiliated with the <a href="Utkal%20University">Utkal University</a> and is recognized by <a href="Dental%20Council%20of%20India">Dental Council of India</a>. It offers <a href="Bachelor%20of%20Dental%20Science">Bachelor of Dental Science</a> (BDS) and Master of Dental Science (MDS) courses.
